planet.name: Kepler-444 f

KOI-3158 A f

LHS 3450 A f
planet.description: This planet is part of the Kepler-444 system. The planetary system is tightly placked with at least 5 terrestrial planets. The host star formed 11 billion years ago, when the universe was less than 20 percent of its current age. This makes Kepler-444 the oldest known system of terrestrial size planets. The star has a companion binary that gets as close as 5 AU at periastron.
